title: The amorous old-vvoman: or, 'tis vvell if it take. A comedy. Acted by His Majesties servants. Written by a person of honour.
author: Duffett, Thomas.
publisher: Printed for Simon Neale at the three Pidgeons in Bedford-street in Covent-Garden,
notes: Reissued in 1684 as: The fond lady.
The final unpaginated leaf contains the epilogue.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
